name: Arcaden
description:
ARCADEN INSTRUCTION MANUAL

DANGER DANGER! A Meteor Belt is making its way On to Earth! The Only way to save the Earth form this threat is the Legendary Solar Savior ship Piloted by The legendary Arcaden. 

The Solar savior has been equipped with a Radical Laser (or Raaser) To tear down through waves of Meteors.  You can Also Equip Battery packs that give you different Power ups. Some Change the directory of your Raser while others change your Ammo entirely. Wrench's are also there in case of a casualty.

Controls

WASD/ arrow keys to move

Space or Z to shoot.
